sentences.english: When greasy, dirty rags are used to wipe the tables.
sentences.chinese: 餐檯下有油脂或髒的膠貼。

sentences.english: He visits public-houses and billiards- saloons.
Andy goes through the breakfast line, gets a scoop of glop on his tray.
sentences.chinese: 安迪走過早餐檯，托盤裏得到了一勺糊糊狀的食品。

sentences.english: When tables and chairs are wobbly.
Back to Shanghai for what would be our last giant lazy-susan meal.
sentences.chinese: 回到上海，用了一頓最後的旋轉餐檯式大餐。

sentences.english: After dinner, mother clears away the table.
sentences.chinese: 晚膳後，媽媽收拾餐檯的碗碗碟碟。

sentences.english: There is an apple and two pears onthe babie.
sentences.chinese: 餐檯上有一個蘋果和兩個梨。

sentences.english: The large bowlder surface of dinner table must be uplifted vertically in avoidance of breakage.
sentences.chinese: 大面積的餐檯玉石面，必須豎擡，避免餐檯斷裂。

sentences.english: It will be the first of this segment to being equipped with series with 4 disc brakes .
sentences.chinese: 它將是這段對用與4檯盤式制動器的系列被裝備。

sentences.english: Can pull out and push in the die from the plate easily.
sentences.chinese: 可使模具輕易從檯盤拉出或推入。

sentences.english: There was a caterers' buffet stretching all around the dining room.
sentences.chinese: 圍着餐廳有一排各個飲食承辦者的冷餐檯。

sentences.english: When silver is set crooked on tables .
sentences.chinese: 餐檯上的銀器是彎曲的。

sentences.english: When buffet tables or salad bars are not replenished quickly.
sentences.chinese: 自助餐檯或沙律吧的食品未能及時補充。
